mapper.update: update slave_relay_log_info set Number_of_lines = #{number_of_lines,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Relay_log_pos = #{relay_log_pos,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Master_log_pos = #{master_log_pos,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Sql_delay = #{sql_delay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Number_of_workers = #{number_of_workers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Relay_log_name = #{relay_log_name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, Master_log_name = #{master_log_name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where Channel_name = #{channel_name,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select Channel_name, Number_of_lines, Relay_log_pos, Master_log_pos, Sql_delay, Number_of_workers, Id, Relay_log_name, Master_log_name from slave_relay_log_info where Channel_name = #{channel_name,jdbcType=CHAR}
select Channel_name, Number_of_lines, Relay_log_pos, Master_log_pos, Sql_delay, Number_of_workers, Id, Relay_log_name, Master_log_name from slave_relay_log_info
